item.title: Ecrett Music: Using AI for Composing Game Music
item.description: Introduction Ecrett Music is a service that uses simple inputs to create tracks that fit the exact type of mood required. It is re-defining the generation of functional music that enhances another medium. The service is equipped to deliver royalty-free background music for videos, games and podcasts.
